items.text: chest-high short ball on leg, cramped for room, shovels it to the right of the keeper
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to NLTC Perera, FOUR runs

items.text: closes the face early to this slider and gets a leading edge to backward point
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Gunaratne, 1 run

items.text: fullish on the pads, flicked uppishly to midwicket
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to NLTC Perera, no run

items.text: turned away behind square on the leg side
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to NLTC Perera, 1 run

items.text: that's as soft a dismissal as any you'll see. Short, wide, slapped straight into the hands of backward point. SL tumbling at an alarming rate
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Gunaratne, OUT

dismissal.text: DAS Gunaratne c Mohammad Saifuddin b Shakib Al Hasan 16 (19b 2x4 0x6) SR: 84.21

items.preText: Keshri: "has Srilanka detoriated over the year or bangladesh and Zimbabwe have imporved .. Or both.. Feeling bad for Srilanka fans.. getting defeats from Bangla and Zims.." Both
items.text: and another one bites the dust. Gets down for a big slog but it's to the wrong length. It's not full enough and he skews a top-edge. Rahim shifts to his left from behind the stumps and snaffles it
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to de Silva, OUT

dismissal.text: PWH de Silva c †Mushfiqur Rahim b Shakib Al Hasan 0 (1b 0x4 0x6) SR: 0.00

items.preText: Just over halfway into the chase and SL are seven down. That's not pretty. Dananjaya to face the hat-trick ball from Shakib
items.text: fullish length, flicked into the leg side comfortably
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Dananjaya, no run
